title: Metal Scraps
full_text:
Metal Scraps

Description
 
Metal scraps are chunks or pieces of metal that are often found in destroyed/salvaged ships and usually are a very common structure. They are regarded under the junk/salvageable category and take up 0.01m3 . They randomly refine into any material except Vexnium and Water. Their description in-game is "Metal scraps from the wreck of a space ship". They often go for a meager price ranging from 1 to 5 credits.
Location
Obtaining metal scraps is a very easy task to accomplish. 
Any destroyed ship.
Bought from another player, or traded from a different player.
X - Structures
Refining
It can be used in a Refinery to recieve: 
Korrelite (16%)
Reknite (9.5%)
Gellium (4.5%)
Axnit (2.1%)
Narcor (1.3%)
Red Narcor (0.2%)
NOTE: All percentages are calculated from small amounts of Metal Scraps please be patient as numbers will often change by the number of Metal Scraps refined.
